steps.plaintext: Investigate the water in the pool during Evernight
steps.markdown: Investigate the water in the pool during ◀Evernight▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Evernight▷

substeps.plaintext: Step is completed upon reaching the Time Tunnel, even if the player does not go through it
substeps.markdown: Step is completed upon reaching the ◀Time Tunnel▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Time_Tunnel▷, even if the player does not go through it

steps.plaintext: Talk to the afterimage in front of the seal
steps.markdown: Talk to the afterimage in front of the seal

steps.plaintext: Release all the Flames of the High Gate (0/4)
steps.markdown: Release all the Flames of the High Gate (0/4)
